name: API
description: A specialized team for interacting with any web API. Consists of APIManager (orchestrator), APIDocs (manages documentation storage), HTTPRequest (executes HTTP calls), Researcher (finds API documentation), and Engineer (retrieves credentials). Capable of: finding API documentation, storing docs in indexed markdown files, making REST API calls (GET/POST/PUT/DELETE/PATCH), handling authentication, managing API credentials, parsing responses, and executing multi-step API workflows. Best for: REST API integrations, web service interactions, API testing, third-party service integrations, webhook handling, API documentation management. The team automatically maintains an indexed catalog of API documentation for reuse.
